players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Looks like Alice was an early target. We should focus on gathering info before rushing to conclusions."
You: "We need to work together to find the mafioso. Anyone have suspicions?"
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to prevent more deaths."
Diana: "Bob, do you trust my claim that Charlie is the mafioso? We need your vote to stop him now before he kills again."
Charlie: "Accusing me without proof won't help us find the real threat. Diana, you’re quick to blame—why should we trust you over me or Bob?"
You: "Diana, why do you suspect Charlie so strongly? We need more evidence before voting."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Looks like Alice was an early target. We should focus on gathering info before rushing to conclusions."
Bob: "We need to work together to find the mafioso. Anyone have suspicions?"
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to prevent more deaths."
Diana: "Bob, do you trust my claim that Charlie is the mafioso? We need your vote to stop him now before he kills again."
You: "Accusing me without proof won't help us find the real threat. Diana, you’re quick to blame—why should we trust you over me or Bob?"
Bob: "Diana, why do you suspect Charlie so strongly? We need more evidence before voting."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Looks like Alice was an early target. We should focus on gathering info before rushing to conclusions."
Bob: "We need to work together to find the mafioso. Anyone have suspicions?"
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to prevent more deaths."
You: "Bob, do you trust my claim that Charlie is the mafioso? We need your vote to stop him now before he kills again."
Charlie: "Accusing me without proof won't help us find the real threat. Diana, you’re quick to blame—why should we trust you over me or Bob?"
Bob: "Diana, why do you suspect Charlie so strongly? We need more evidence before voting."
